WorkoutMaker Which category do you fit into? How many days off would you like in the weekdays? What is your equipment preference? //buttons Next Back One Day Two Day Three Day
Hello blank fragment BmiActivity
First Fragment Second Fragment Previous //titles General Information //bodies of text for bmi screen Most muscle shows for men at around 3-15% body fat, for women 10-17% Running long distance burns fat, while sprinting burns carbs Core workouts alone do not result in abs, it also requires a low fat percentage and good dieting //bodies of text for help screen How do I know what skill level I am? If you have had experience in the gym for over a year, consider yourself experienced for this app Why should I take rest days Rest days are needed for your body to build the muscle back after breaking it down. Also many people face burnout which drives a lot of people from sticking to a schedule Image sources Kelly Sikkema, Nathan Dumlao, Logan Weaver, Roberto Nickson, Yuriy Bogdanov, Andrew H, Karsten Winegeart, Clique Images //built by android studio Hello first fragment Hello second fragment.
